description: This file defines a mock class 'ServiceMock' inheriting from 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell', using Google Mock framework to facilitate unit testing of components interacting with this interface. It includes method mock declarations for various service-related functions, and supports interface mapping.

classes.name: ServiceMock
classes.description: A mock class implementing the 'WPEFramework::PluginHost::IShell' interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: Versions
methods.description: Returns the version string of the service.

methods.name: Locator
methods.description: Returns the locator string of the service.

methods.name: ClassName
methods.description: Returns the class name of the service.

methods.name: Callsign
methods.description: Returns the callsign of the service.

methods.name: State
methods.description: Returns the current state of the service.

methods.name: Resumed
methods.description: Indicates if the service has resumed.

methods.name: IsSupported
methods.description: Checks if a feature or service is supported based on input.

methods.name: EnableWebServer
methods.description: Enables the web server with given parameters.

methods.name: Submit
methods.description: Submits a request with identifiers and JSON data.

methods.name: Notify
methods.description: Sends a notification with name and message.

methods.name: Background
methods.description: Indicates if the service runs in background.

methods.name: ConfigLine (overloaded)
methods.description: Returns configuration line for a specific string.

methods.name: StartMode
methods.description: Returns the start mode of the service.
